channel.title: Help With a runserver Error
channel.description:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:312) at ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:28)
Ok, this is what i get when i open up 'runserver.bat'. It wont allow anyone onto my server, because they are already online, apparently. Any1 got any idea what the problem is? Can you add n-a-t-h-a-n@hotmail.co.uk to help please.

item.title: Help With a runserver Error
item.dc:creator: @sc0tt_pk sc0tt pk
item.description:
@sc0tt_pk wrote:

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Press any key to continue . . .

My compiler has no errors listed.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 17, 2007, 10:32:34 AM[/size][br][size=1]Posted on: September 17, 2007, 10:33:14 AM[/size][hr][quote=“croranger, post:4, topic:144227”]is not in item.java is in itemhandler.java[/quote]
Woops, It was itemhandler.java that i replaced, that was a typo =][br][size=1]Posted on: September 17, 2007, 10:35:42 AM[/size][hr]If i re un-zipped the Source, and replaced every file except itemhandler.class +.java, would it work?
